name: obsidian-note-zoom
description: Zoom notes in and out, with cross-session persistence.

scripts.buildWindows: del /f obsidian-note-zoom.zip 2>null && rmdir /s /q build 2>null && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && mkdir build && copy manifest.json build && copy README.md build && copy LICENSE build && copy main.js build && copy styles.css build && powershell -command "& { Add-Type -AssemblyName 'System.IO.Compression.FileSystem'; [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::CreateFromDirectory('build', 'obsidian-note-zoom.zip') }"
scripts.buildLinux: rm -rf build && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && mkdir -p build && cp manifest.json build && cp README.md build && cp LICENSE build && cp main.js build && cp styles.css build && zip -j obsidian-note-zoom.zip build/README.md build/LICENSE build/manifest.json build/main.js build/styles.css
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
